General.Name: AKB Avangard OAO
General.Description: AVANGARD Joint Stock BANK provides various banking products and services to individual and corporate clients in Russia. The company offers deposits, car loans, and bank and corporate cards; and securities and precious metals transaction, safe box, settlement and cash, currency control, and money transfer services, as well as Internet banking services. It is also involved in the documentary operations; and the financing of import contracts. AVANGARD Joint Stock BANK was founded in 1994 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
